descs.desc: Repeating abnormality work macro with Insert/Home/End shortcuts.
Shift + Work command: activate the original repeating macro.
Insert: save current moving/working agents and their target abnormality/work.
Shift + Insert: print the saved Insert layout to system log.
Home: assign dispatchable agents to the saved Insert layout.
End: cancel only en-route work actions for agents saved by Insert.
